channel.title: Bash on Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Notebook

item.description: Bash basics # Get unix timestamp # date +%s

Managing screen sessions # Basics # Start screen session and give it a name: screen -S ScreenTest Detach from current session: Ctrl-A d List sessions: screen -ls Re-attach to an existing session: screen -r <PID> Re-attach session, if necessary detach or create: screen -dRR ScreenTest Force-exit screen: Ctrl-A Ctrl-\ Kill session: screen -S ScreenTest -X quit Clean all dead screen sessions: screen -wipe
